      • setImportoSingoloVersamento

        public RptDatiSingoloVersamento.Builder setImportoSingoloVersamento(BigDecimal importoSingoloVersamento)
        Set the importoSingoloVersamento
        Parameters:
        importoSingoloVersamento - the amount to be paid.
        Not null.
        Max 12 digits, 2 decimals.
        Min value = 0.01
        Returns:
        the importoSingoloVersamento field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        DPSinglePaymentDetail, RptValidationImpl

        public RptDatiSingoloVersamento.Builder setCommissioneCaricoPA(BigDecimal commissioneCaricoPA)
        Set the commissioneCaricoPA
        Parameters:
        commissioneCaricoPA - the amount of any commission due to the PSP of which is the responsibility of the Creditor.
        Max 12 digits, 2 decimals.
        Min value = 0.01
        Returns:
        the commissioneCaricoPA field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder

      • setIbanAccredito

        public RptDatiSingoloVersamento.Builder setIbanAccredito(String ibanAccredito)
        Set the ibanAccredito
        Parameters:
        ibanAccredito - iban of the account to be credited.
        Max 35 chars.
        Must respect the following regExp: "[a-zA-Z]{2,2}[0-9]{2,2}[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,30}"
        Returns:
        the ibanAccredito field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        DPSinglePaymentDetail, RptValidationImpl

      • setIuv

        public RptDatiSingoloVersamento.Builder setIuv(String iuv)
        Set the iuv
        Parameters:
        iuv - unique reference assigned to the payment by the Creditor.
        used for the calculation of the causaleVersamento.
        Not null nor empty.
        Max 35 chars.
        Returns:
        the iuv field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        RptDatiVersamento, DPPaymentDetail

      • setDescrizioneCausaleVersamento

        public RptDatiSingoloVersamento.Builder setDescrizioneCausaleVersamento(String descrizioneCausaleVersamento)
        Set the descrizioneCausaleVersamento
        Parameters:
        descrizioneCausaleVersamento - the reason for the single payment.
        the textual part provided in the causaleVersamento after the placeholder "/TXT".
        Not null nor empty.
        Max 100 chars.
        Returns:
        the descrizioneCausaleVersamento field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        DPSinglePaymentDetail

      • setDatiSpecificiRiscossione

        public RptDatiSingoloVersamento.Builder setDatiSpecificiRiscossione(String datiSpecificiRiscossione)
        Set the datiSpecificiRiscossione
        Parameters:
        datiSpecificiRiscossione - the indication of the attribution of the specification entry.
        Not null nor empty.
        Max 140 chars.
        Must have this format: "tipoContabilità/codiceContabilità" which must respect the following regExp: "[0129]{1}/\S{3,138}"
        Returns:
        the datiSpecificiRiscossione field is set in RptDatiSingoloVersamento builder
        See Also:
        DPPaymentDetail
